gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: WWHETHER npro IS V OR NOT

sense.def: Npro's Nab-ness or otherwise
Nab is an abstract feature of npro. 修其孝悌忠信"cultivate their filial and fraternal love, the loyality and trustworthiness"
